com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao

Class PriceDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.PriceDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PriceDao

    @ApplicationScoped
public class PriceDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PriceDao
    The class PriceDaoImpl contains all the methods implementation to query the Prices table. It contains the basic CRUD methods and additional methods that were needed. This class implements the PriceDao interface
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
